name: FoxChemist
description:
Description

Foxchemist is a combination of labyrinth and alchemy game styles. I am learning Unity and I wanted to put my new skills in practice in this game. 

The game is about finding elements like earth, fire or even time. 

There are currently 17 levels and 52 elements. I didn't want to progress more before getting any feed back so I would appreciate it if you write your thoughts about the game.
